title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, and browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); manage models, chat history, multi-user, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper around ollama-python; chat, pull, list, and delete models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings → local Llama-2 chat, all offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models privately in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama chat, generate, or embed endpoints inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model init jobs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starter available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust crate for Ollama REST API; tokio-based with serde models, published on crates.io.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and embed with idiomatic Go wrappers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama; NuGet package with chat, generate, and embeddings APIs.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for community-tuned Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, and Zephyr variants.

title: ollama-rag-redis
summary: Redis vector-search RAG template using Ollama embeddings and Llama-2-chat; deployable on Redis Cloud free tier.
